segments.text: Ms . Wang , this is Mr . Cooper , president of Ivy Publishing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's nice to meet you , Mr . Cooper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you , Ms . Wang . You must be exhausted after your long trip from Canada .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it was quite a long flight . I'm glad to finally be here .
segments.speaker: S2
